item.title: Docs: Slack
item.description:
There is a dedicated Slack channel for both Docker Captains as well as Docker Community Leaders. There, other Docker Captains and Docker staff ask questions, share feedback and more.

You can join Docker community Slack via http://dockr.ly/slack

In case you face any issue enrolling for Community Slack, reach out to William
